Name: bulbasaur
Flavor_Text:
BULBASAUR can be seen napping in
bright sunlight.
There is a seed on its back.By soaking up the sun’s rays, the seed
grows progressively larger.

Name: ivysaur
Flavor_Text:
When the bulb on its back grows large, it
appears to lose the ability to stand on its
hind legs.

Name: charmeleon
Flavor_Text:
It has a barbaric
nature. In battle,
it whips itsfiery tail around
and slashes away
with sharp claws.

Name: charizard
Flavor_Text:
When expelling a blast of superhot fire,
the red flame at the tip of its tail burns
more intensely.

Name: squirtle
Flavor_Text:
The shell, which hardens soon after
it is born, is resilient. If you
poke it, it will bounce back out.

Name: wartortle
Flavor_Text:
It is recognized as a symbol of longevity. If its
shell has algae on it, that Wartortle is very old.

Name: butterfree
Flavor_Text:
It loves the honey of flowers and
can locate flower patches that
have even tiny amounts of pollen.

Name: kakuna
Flavor_Text:
Nearly incapable
of movement, it
leans againststout trees while
waiting for its
evolution.

Name: fearow
Flavor_Text:
With its huge and magnificent wings, it can
keep aloft without ever having to land
for rest.

Name: ekans
Flavor_Text:
The eggs of bird Pokémon are its favorite food.
It swallows eggs whole, so sometimes an egg
gets stuck, and Ekans faints.

Name: pikachu
Flavor_Text:
This Pikachu wears its partner’s cap, which is
brimming with memories of traveling through
many different regions.

Name: sandslash
Flavor_Text:
This is Sandslash’s form after adaptation to a
frigid environment. The cold air emitted by its
body sharpens its icy spikes.

Name: nidoran-f
Flavor_Text:
Although small,
its venomous
barbs render thisPOKéMON dangerous.
The female has
smaller horns.

Name: nidorino
Flavor_Text:
Nidorino has a horn that is harder than a diamond. If it senses
a hostile presence, all the barbs on its back bristle up at once,
and it challenges the foe with all its might.

Name: nidoking
Flavor_Text:
One swing of its mighty tail can
snap a telephone pole as if it were
a matchstick.

Name: clefairy
Flavor_Text:
On nights with a full moon, they gather together
and dance. The surrounding area is enveloped
in an abnormal magnetic field.

Name: vulpix
Flavor_Text:
While young, it has six gorgeous tails. When it
grows, several new tails are sprouted.

Name: ninetales
Flavor_Text:
Some legends claim that each of its
nine tails has its own unique type
of special mystical power.

Name: jigglypuff
Flavor_Text:
If it inflates to sing a lullaby, it can perform longer
and cause sure drowsiness in its audience.

Name: paras
Flavor_Text:
Mushrooms named tochukaso grow
on its back. They grow along
with the host Paras.

Name: venonat
Flavor_Text:
Its eyes act as radar, enabling it to be
active in darkness. The eyes can also
shoot powerful beams.

Name: venomoth
Flavor_Text:
VENOMOTH is nocturnal - it is a POKéMON
that only becomes active at night.
Its favorite prey are small insectsthat gather around streetlights,
attracted by the light in the darkness.

Name: diglett
Flavor_Text:
After living in soil with high iron content for
some time, three steel whiskers sprouted from
the top of its head.

Name: dugtrio
Flavor_Text:
A team of triplets that can burrow to a depth
of 60 miles. It’s reported that this triggers
an earthquake.

Name: persian
Flavor_Text:
The round face of Alolan Persian is considered to
be a symbol of prosperity in the Alola region, so
these Pokémon are very well cared for.

Name: psyduck
Flavor_Text:
It has been found that its brain cells are
10 times more active when Psyduck is
experiencing a headache.

Name: golduck
Flavor_Text:
When it swims at full speed using
its long, webbed limbs, its forehead
somehow begins to glow.

Name: mankey
Flavor_Text:
Its raging tires it out and causes it to fall asleep,
but the anger resonating in its dreams causes it
to wake up—which infuriates it all over again.

Name: primeape
Flavor_Text:
It grows angry if you see its eyes
and gets angrier if you run. If you
beat it, it gets even madder.

Name: growlithe
Flavor_Text:
It’s both clever and loyal, but if a stranger tries
to invade its territory, it barks threateningly.

Name: abra
Flavor_Text:
It hypnotizes
itself so that it
can teleport awaywhen it senses
danger, even
if it is asleep.

Name: machamp
Flavor_Text:
It quickly swings
its four arms to
rock its opponentswith ceaseless
punches and chops
from all angles.

Name: weepinbell
Flavor_Text:
The leafy parts act as cutters for
slashing foes. It spits a fluid that
dissolves everything.

Name: tentacruel
Flavor_Text:
Although these Pokémon are rare, when a large
outbreak of them occurs, all fish Pokémon
disappear from the surrounding sea.

Name: geodude
Flavor_Text:
It is impossible to distinguish from
rocks. It slams against others in
contests of hardness.

Name: graveler
Flavor_Text:
It travels by rol­
ling on mountain
paths. If it gainstoo much speed, it
stops by running
into huge rocks.

Name: rapidash
Flavor_Text:
RAPIDASH usually can be seen casually
cantering in the fields and plains.
However, when this POKéMON turnsserious, its fiery manes flare and blaze
as it gallops its way up to 150 mph.

Name: slowpoke
Flavor_Text:
Its long tail often breaks off. It doesn’t really
feel any pain, though, and the tail grows back,
so Slowpoke isn’t particularly bothered.

Name: farfetchd
Flavor_Text:
They live where reedy plants grow.
Farfetch’d are rarely seen, so it’s thought
their numbers are decreasing.

Name: doduo
Flavor_Text:
The brains in its two heads appear to communicate
emotions to each other with a telepathic power.

Name: dodrio
Flavor_Text:
One of Doduo’s two heads splits to form
a unique species. It runs close to 40 mph
in prairies.

Name: dewgong
Flavor_Text:
It loves frigid seas with ice
floes. It uses its long tail to
change swimming direction quickly.

Name: grimer
Flavor_Text:
Grimer emerged from the sludge that settled on a polluted
seabed. This Pokémon loves anything filthy. It constantly
leaks a horribly germ-infested fluid from all over its body.

Name: haunter
Flavor_Text:
By licking, it saps the victim’s life. It causes
shaking that won’t stop until the victim’s demise.

Name: gengar
Flavor_Text:
Sometimes, on a dark night, your shadow thrown by a
streetlight will suddenly and startlingly overtake you.
It is actually a Gengar running past you, pretending to be
your shadow.

Name: drowzee
Flavor_Text:
If you think that you had a good dream but you
can’t remember it, a Drowzee has probably eaten it.

Name: hypno
Flavor_Text:
Avoid eye contact
if you come across
one. It will tryto put you to
sleep by using
its pendulum.

Name: krabby
Flavor_Text:
It can be found near the sea. The large pincers
grow back if they are torn out of their sockets.

Name: kingler
Flavor_Text:
Its pincers grow peculiarly large.
If it lifts the pincers too fast,
it loses its balance and staggers.

Name: marowak
Flavor_Text:
It collects bones from an unknown place.
Some whisper that a MAROWAK graveyard
exists somewhere in the world.

Name: weezing
Flavor_Text:
Inhaling toxic fumes from trash
and mixing them inside its body
lets it spread an even fouler stench.

Name: chansey
Flavor_Text:
A rare and elusive
POKéMON that is
said to bringhappiness to those
who manage to get
it.

Name: kangaskhan
Flavor_Text:
If it is safe, the young gets out of
the belly pouch to play. The adult
keeps a close eye on the youngster.

Name: seadra
Flavor_Text:
Its spines provide protection.
Its fins and bones are prized as
traditional-medicine ingredients.

Name: mr-mime
Flavor_Text:
If interrupted while it is miming, it will
suddenly DOUBLESLAP the offender with its
broad hands.

Name: scyther
Flavor_Text:
The sharp scythes on its forearms
become increasingly sharp by
cutting through hard objects.

Name: jynx
Flavor_Text:
It rocks its body
rhythmically. It
appears to alterthe rhythm depend­
ing on how it is
feeling.

Name: tauros
Flavor_Text:
It is not satisfied unless it is rampaging
at all times. If there is no opponent for
TAUROS to battle, it will charge at thick
trees and knock them down to calm itself.

Name: magikarp
Flavor_Text:
This weak and pathetic Pokémon gets easily
pushed along rivers when there are strong currents.

Name: lapras
Flavor_Text:
Over 5,000 people can ride on its shell at once.
And it’s a very comfortable ride, without the
slightest shaking or swaying.

Name: eevee
Flavor_Text:
It has the ability to alter the composition of its
body to suit its surrounding environment.

Name: jolteon
Flavor_Text:
It accumulates negative ions in the atmosphere to
blast out 10,000-volt lightning bolts.

Name: flareon
Flavor_Text:
FLAREON’s fluffy fur has a functional
purpose - it releases heat into the air
so that its body does not getexcessively hot.
This POKéMON’s body temperature can
rise to a maximum of 1,650 degrees F.

Name: porygon
Flavor_Text:
Using the most advanced technologies,
scientists finally succeeded in making the
first artificial POKéMON.

Name: omastar
Flavor_Text:
Apparently, it
cracked SHELLDER's
shell with itssharp fangs and
sucked out the
insides.

Name: kabuto
Flavor_Text:
Kabuto is a Pokémon that has been regenerated from a fossil.
However, in extremely rare cases, living examples have been
discovered. The Pokémon has not changed at all for
300 million years.

Name: kabutops
Flavor_Text:
It is thought that this Pokémon
came onto land because its
prey adapted to life on land.

Name: snorlax
Flavor_Text:
What sounds like
its cry may ac­
tually be itssnores or the
rumblings of its
hungry belly.

Name: articuno
Flavor_Text:
One of the legendary bird POKéMON.
With its long tail trailing behind, its
flying form is magnificent.

Name: zapdos
Flavor_Text:
This legendary
bird POKéMON is
said to appearwhen the sky turns
dark and lightning
showers down.

Name: mewtwo
Flavor_Text:
A POKéMON that was created by genetic
manipulation. However, even though the
scientific power of humans made its body,
they failed to give it a warm heart.

Name: mew
Flavor_Text:
Mew is said to possess the genetic composition of all
Pokémon. It is capable of making itself invisible at will,
so it entirely avoids notice even if it approaches people.

Name: quilava
Flavor_Text:
It intimidates foes with the heat
of its flames. The fire burns more
strongly when it readies to fight.

Name: typhlosion
Flavor_Text:
It attacks using blasts of fire.
It creates heat shimmers with
intense fire to hide itself.

Name: feraligatr
Flavor_Text:
It opens its huge mouth to intimidate
enemies. In battle, it runs using its thick
and powerful hind legs to charge the
foe with incredible speed.

Name: furret
Flavor_Text:
The mother puts its offspring to sleep by curling up
around them. It corners foes with speed.

Name: ledian
Flavor_Text:
While it’s believed that starlight provides it with
energy, this Pokémon also loves to eat berries.
In the daytime, it curls up in the grass to sleep.

Name: ariados
Flavor_Text:
A single strand of a special string
is endlessly spun out of its rear.
The string leads back to its nest.

Name: pichu
Flavor_Text:
It plays with others by touching tails and setting off
sparks. This appears to be a test of courage.

Name: togepi
Flavor_Text:
A proverb claims that happiness
will come to anyone who can make a
sleeping TOGEPI stand up.

Name: xatu
Flavor_Text:
They say that it stays still and quiet because it is
seeing both the past and future at the same time.

Name: mareep
Flavor_Text:
Its fluffy coat swells to double
when static electricity builds up.
Touching it can be shocking.

Name: flaaffy
Flavor_Text:
As a result of storing too much
electricity, it developed patches where
even downy wool won’t grow.

Name: marill
Flavor_Text:
When fishing for food at the edge of a fast-running stream,
Marill wraps its tail around the trunk of a tree. This Pokémon’s
tail is flexible and configured to stretch.

Name: azumarill
Flavor_Text:
It lives in rivers and lakes. In
water, its coloring and patterns
trick the vision of foes.

Name: skiploom
Flavor_Text:
Skiploom’s flower blossoms when the temperature rises
above 64 degrees Fahrenheit. How much the flower opens
depends on the temperature. For that reason, this Pokémon
is sometimes used as a thermometer.

Name: jumpluff
Flavor_Text:
Once it catches
the wind, it deft­
ly controls itscotton-puff spores
to float, even
around the world.

Name: aipom
Flavor_Text:
It uses its tail
to hang on to tree
branches. It usesits momentum to
swing from one
branch to another.

Name: sunflora
Flavor_Text:
As the hot season
approaches, the
petals on thisPOKéMON's face
become more vivid
and lively.

Name: yanma
Flavor_Text:
By flapping its wings at high speed,
it can fly freely through the air.
Even sudden stops are no problem.

Name: umbreon
Flavor_Text:
On the night of a
full moon, or when
it gets excited,the ring patterns
on its body glow
yellow.

Name: murkrow
Flavor_Text:
If spotted, it will lure an unwary
person into chasing it, then lose
the pursuer on mountain trails.

Name: wobbuffet
Flavor_Text:
It hates light and shock. If
attacked, it inflates its body to
build up its counterstrike.

Name: girafarig
Flavor_Text:
Its tail, which also contains a small
brain, may bite on its own if it notices an
alluring smell.

Name: pineco
Flavor_Text:
PINECO hangs from a tree branch and
patiently waits for prey to come along.
If the POKéMON is disturbed whileeating by someone shaking its tree, it
drops down to the ground and explodes
with no warning.

Name: forretress
Flavor_Text:
It is encased in a steel shell. Its
peering eyes are all that can be
seen of its mysterious innards.

Name: snubbull
Flavor_Text:
By baring its fangs and making a scary face, Snubbull sends
smaller Pokémon scurrying away in terror. However, this
Pokémon seems a little sad at making its foes flee.

Name: granbull
Flavor_Text:
Granbull has a particularly well-developed lower jaw.
The enormous fangs are heavy, causing the Pokémon to tip
its head back for balance. Unless it is startled, it will not try to
bite indiscriminately.

Name: scizor
Flavor_Text:
Once it has identified something as an enemy, it
will continue beating them with its steel-hard
pincers until there’s nothing left but scraps.

Name: heracross
Flavor_Text:
HERACROSS charges in a straight line at
its foe, slips beneath the foe’s grasp,
and then scoops up and hurls theopponent with its mighty horn.
This POKéMON even has enough power
to topple a massive tree.

Name: slugma
Flavor_Text:
These group to­
gether in areas
that are hotterthan normal. If it
cools off, its
skin hardens.

Name: swinub
Flavor_Text:
It rubs its snout on the ground to find and dig up
food. It sometimes discovers hot springs.

Name: houndoom
Flavor_Text:
Long ago, people imagined its eerie howls to be
the call of the grim reaper.

Name: kingdra
Flavor_Text:
With the arrival of a storm at sea, this Pokémon
will show itself on the surface. When a Kingdra
and a Dragonite meet, a fierce battle ensues.

Name: donphan
Flavor_Text:
It attacks by curling up, then
rolling into its foe. It can blow
apart a house in one hit.

Name: stantler
Flavor_Text:
Staring at its antlers creates
an odd sensation as if one were
being drawn into their centers.

Name: smoochum
Flavor_Text:
It always rocks its head slowly backwards
and forwards as if it is trying to kiss
someone.

Name: elekid
Flavor_Text:
It rotates its arms to generate
electricity, but it tires easily,
so it only charges up a little bit.

Name: miltank
Flavor_Text:
It gives over five gallons of milk daily.
Its sweet milk is enjoyed by children and
grown-ups alike. People who can’t drink
milk turn it into yogurt and eat it instead.

Name: pupitar
Flavor_Text:
Pupitar creates a gas inside its body that it compresses and
forcefully ejects to propel itself like a jet. The body is very
durable—it avoids damage even if it hits solid steel.

Name: ho-oh
Flavor_Text:
A legend says that
its body glows in
seven colors. Arainbow is said to
form behind it
when it flies.

Name: celebi
Flavor_Text:
It has the power to travel across
time, but it is said to appear only
in peaceful times.

Name: treecko
Flavor_Text:
The soles of its feet are covered
by countless tiny spikes, enabling
it to walk on walls and ceilings.

Name: sceptile
Flavor_Text:
The leaves that grow on its arms
can slice down thick trees. It is
without peer in jungle combat.

Name: torchic
Flavor_Text:
Torchic has a place inside its body where it keeps its flame.
Give it a hug—it will be glowing with warmth. This Pokémon is
covered all over by a fluffy coat of down.

Name: combusken
Flavor_Text:
It lashes out with 10 kicks per second.
Its strong fighting instinct compels it
to keep up its offensive until the
opponent gives up.

Name: mudkip
Flavor_Text:
The fin on Mudkip’s head acts as highly sensitive radar.
Using this fin to sense movements of water and air, this
Pokémon can determine what is taking place around it
without using its eyes.

Name: poochyena
Flavor_Text:
It chases its prey until the victim
becomes exhausted. However, it
turns tail if the prey strikes back.

Name: linoone
Flavor_Text:
It charges prey at speeds over
60 mph. However, because it can
only run straight, it often fails.

Name: wurmple
Flavor_Text:
Often targeted by bird Pokémon,
it desperately resists by releasing
poison from its tail spikes.

Name: silcoon
Flavor_Text:
It wraps silk around the branches
of a tree. It drinks rainwater on
its silk while awaiting evolution.

Name: lotad
Flavor_Text:
Its leaf grew too large for it to
live on land. That is how it began
to live floating in the water.

Name: ludicolo
Flavor_Text:
The rhythm of bright, festive music
activates LUDICOLO’s cells, making it more
powerful.

Name: seedot
Flavor_Text:
It attaches itself to a tree branch using the top of
its head. Strong winds can sometimes make it fall.

Name: shiftry
Flavor_Text:
It lives quietly in the deep forest. It is said to
create chilly winter winds with the fans it holds.

Name: swellow
Flavor_Text:
SWELLOW is very conscientious about
the upkeep of its glossy wings.
Once two SWELLOW are gathered, theydiligently take care of cleaning each
other’s wings.

Name: wingull
Flavor_Text:
It makes its nest on a sheer cliff at the
edge of the sea. It has trouble keeping
its wings flapping in flight. Instead, it
soars on updrafts.

Name: ralts
Flavor_Text:
It is highly attuned to the emotions of people
and Pokémon. It hides if it senses hostility.

Name: kirlia
Flavor_Text:
The cheerful spirit of its TRAINER gives
it energy for its psychokinetic power.
It spins and dances when happy.

Name: masquerain
Flavor_Text:
Masquerain’s antennas have eyelike patterns that usually
give it an angry look. If the “eyes” are droopy and appear sad,
it is said to be a sign that a heavy rainfall is on its way.

Name: slaking
Flavor_Text:
The world’s laziest Pokémon.
It moves to another spot when there’s
no food left within its reach.

Name: nincada
Flavor_Text:
Nincada lives underground for many years in complete
darkness. This Pokémon absorbs nutrients from the roots of
trees. It stays motionless as it waits for evolution.

Name: exploud
Flavor_Text:
Its howls can be heard over six
miles away. It emits all sorts of
noises from the ports on its body.

Name: hariyama
Flavor_Text:
It loves to match power with
big-bodied Pokémon. It can knock a
truck flying with its arm thrusts.

Name: nosepass
Flavor_Text:
When endangered, it may protect
itself by raising its magnetism and
drawing iron objects to its body.

Name: skitty
Flavor_Text:
Skitty has the habit of becoming fascinated by moving objects
and chasing them around. This Pokémon is known to chase
after its own tail and become dizzy.

Name: delcatty
Flavor_Text:
It is highly popular among female
Trainers for its sublime fur.
It does not keep a nest.

Name: sableye
Flavor_Text:
SABLEYE lead quiet lives deep inside
caverns. They are feared, however,
because these POKéMON are thought tosteal the spirits of people when their
eyes burn with a sinister glow in the
darkness.

Name: mawile
Flavor_Text:
Attached to its head is a huge set of jaws formed
by horns. It can chew through iron beams.

Name: aggron
Flavor_Text:
It claims a large mountain as its sole
territory. It mercilessly thrashes those
that violate its space.

Name: manectric
Flavor_Text:
It discharges electricity from its
mane. It creates a thundercloud
overhead to drop lightning bolts.

Name: gulpin
Flavor_Text:
There is nothing its stomach can’t digest.
While it is digesting, vile, overpowering
gases are expelled.

Name: swalot
Flavor_Text:
It can swallow a tire whole in one gulp.
It secretes a horribly toxic fluid from
the pores on its body.

Name: sharpedo
Flavor_Text:
It has a sad history. In the past, its dorsal fin
was a treasured foodstuff, so this Pokémon
became a victim of overfishing.

Name: wailmer
Flavor_Text:
WAILMER’s nostrils are located above
its eyes. This playful POKéMON loves
to startle people by forcefully snortingout seawater it stores inside its body
out of its nostrils.

Name: camerupt
Flavor_Text:
The humps on Camerupt’s back are formed by a transformation
of its bones. They sometimes blast out molten magma.
This Pokémon apparently erupts often when it is enraged.

Name: spoink
Flavor_Text:
It apparently dies if it stops bouncing
about. It carries a pearl from CLAMPERL
on its head.

Name: trapinch
Flavor_Text:
Its jaws are strong enough to crush rocks but
so heavy that it can’t get up if it flips over.
Sandile seize those moments as their chance.

Name: altaria
Flavor_Text:
Altaria sings in a gorgeous soprano. Its wings are like cotton
clouds. This Pokémon catches updrafts with its buoyant wings
and soars way up into the wild blue yonder.

Name: lunatone
Flavor_Text:
Its health ebbs and flows with the lunar
cycle. It brims with power when exposed
to the light of the full moon.

Name: solrock
Flavor_Text:
When it rotates itself, it gives off light similar to
the sun, thus blinding its foes.

Name: barboach
Flavor_Text:
Its slimy body is hard to grasp. In
one region, it is said to have been
born from hardened mud.

Name: claydol
Flavor_Text:
CLAYDOL are said to be dolls of mud made
by primitive humans and brought to life
by exposure to a mysterious ray.This POKéMON moves about while
levitating.

Name: lileep
Flavor_Text:
It lived on the seafloor 100
million years ago and was
reanimated scientifically.

Name: feebas
Flavor_Text:
It eats anything, so it can even live in polluted
streams and lakes. No one pays any attention to it.

Name: castform
Flavor_Text:
CASTFORM’s appearance changes with
the weather.
This POKéMON gained the ability to usethe vast power of nature to protect
its tiny body.

Name: kecleon
Flavor_Text:
It can freely change its body’s color. The zigzag
pattern on its belly doesn’t change, however.

Name: shuppet
Flavor_Text:
It loves vengeful emotions and
hangs in rows under the eaves of
houses where vengeful people live.

Name: duskull
Flavor_Text:
Making itself invisible, it silently sneaks
up to prey. It has the ability to slip
through thick walls.

Name: tropius
Flavor_Text:
Bunches of delicious fruit grow around its neck.
In warm areas, many ranches raise Tropius.

Name: snorunt
Flavor_Text:
It is said that several Snorunt gather under giant
leaves and live together in harmony.

Name: glalie
Flavor_Text:
It freezes its prey and chews them whole.
However, it prefers to eat Pokémon like Vanillite
that are already frozen.

Name: spheal
Flavor_Text:
They can’t swim well yet,
and they move much faster by rolling.
When they’re happy, they clap fins.

Name: sealeo
Flavor_Text:
Sealeo often balances and rolls things on the tip of its
nose. While the Pokémon is rolling something, it checks
the object’s aroma and texture to determine whether it likes
the object or not.

Name: clamperl
Flavor_Text:
It makes a single pearl during
its lifetime. The pearl is said
to amplify psychic power.

Name: huntail
Flavor_Text:
It lives deep in the sea. With a
tail shaped like a small fish, it
attracts unsuspecting prey.

Name: relicanth
Flavor_Text:
RELICANTH is a POKéMON species that
existed for a hundred million years
without ever changing its form.This ancient POKéMON feeds on
microscopic organisms with its
toothless mouth.

Name: shelgon
Flavor_Text:
The cells within its body are changing at a
bewildering pace. Its hard shell is made from
the same substance as bone.

Name: salamence
Flavor_Text:
As a result of its long-held dream
of flying, its cellular structure
changed, and wings grew out.

Name: metang
Flavor_Text:
It floats midair using magnetism. Its body
is so tough, even a crash with a jet
plane won’t leave a scratch.

Name: regirock
Flavor_Text:
The same rocks that form its body
have been found in ground layers
around the world.

Name: kyogre
Flavor_Text:
This POKéMON is said to have
expanded the sea by bringing heavy rains.
It has the power to control water.

Name: jirachi
Flavor_Text:
JIRACHI will awaken from its sleep of
a thousand years if you sing to it in a
voice of purity.It is said to make true any wish that
people desire.

Name: deoxys
Flavor_Text:
An alien virus that fell to earth
on a meteor underwent a DNA
mutation to become this Pokémon.

Name: turtwig
Flavor_Text:
The shell on its back is made of
soil. On a very healthy Turtwig,
the shell should feel moist.

Name: chimchar
Flavor_Text:
It is very agile. Before going to
sleep, it extinguishes the flame
on its tail to prevent fires.

Name: piplup
Flavor_Text:
A poor walker, it often falls down.
However, its strong pride makes it
puff up its chest without a care.

Name: prinplup
Flavor_Text:
Because every Prinplup considers
itself to be the most important,
they can never form a group.

Name: empoleon
Flavor_Text:
If anyone were to hurt its pride,
it would slash them with wings that
can cleave through an ice floe.

Name: staraptor
Flavor_Text:
It has a savage nature. It will
courageously challenge foes that
are much larger.

Name: shinx
Flavor_Text:
All of its fur dazzles if danger is
sensed. It flees while the foe is
momentarily blinded.

Name: luxio
Flavor_Text:
Strong electricity courses through
the tips of its sharp claws. A light
scratch causes fainting in foes.

Name: cranidos
Flavor_Text:
A lifelong jungle dweller from 100
million years ago, it would snap
obstructing trees with head butts.

Name: bastiodon
Flavor_Text:
Any frontal attack is repulsed. It is a docile
Pokémon that feeds on grass and berries.

Name: mothim
Flavor_Text:
It flutters around at night and
steals honey from the COMBEE hive.

Name: vespiquen
Flavor_Text:
It raises grubs in the holes in its
body. It secretes pheromones to
control COMBEE.

Name: pachirisu
Flavor_Text:
It’s one of the kinds of Pokémon 
with electric cheek pouches.
It shoots charges from its tail.

Name: buizel
Flavor_Text:
It inflates the flotation sac around
its neck and pokes its head out of
the water to see what is going on.

Name: floatzel
Flavor_Text:
With its flotation sac inflated, it
can carry people on its back. It
deflates the sac before it dives.

Name: cherrim
Flavor_Text:
If it senses strong sunlight, it
opens its folded petals to absorb
the sun’s rays with its whole body.

Name: shellos
Flavor_Text:
Purple mucus sticks to the hands of anyone
who touches it. Take care, as the substance is
troublesome to wash off.

Name: gastrodon
Flavor_Text:
Long ago, its entire back was
shielded with a sturdy shell. There
are traces of it left in its cells.

Name: drifloon
Flavor_Text:
Because of the way it floats
aimlessly, an old folktale calls it a
“Signpost for Wandering Spirits.”

Name: buneary
Flavor_Text:
Its ears are always rolled up. They
can be forcefully extended to
shatter even a large boulder.

Name: lopunny
Flavor_Text:
An extremely cautious Pokémon.
It cloaks its body with its fluffy
ear fur when it senses danger.

Name: honchkrow
Flavor_Text:
If its Murkrow cronies fail to catch food for it,
or if it feels they have betrayed it, it will hunt
them down wherever they are and punish them.

Name: chingling
Flavor_Text:
Each time it hops, it makes a
ringing sound. It deafens foes by
emitting high-frequency cries.

Name: spiritomb
Flavor_Text:
Its constant mischief and misdeeds
resulted in it being bound to an Odd
Keystone by a mysterious spell.

Name: gible
Flavor_Text:
It attacks using its huge mouth.
While its attacks are powerful, it
hurts itself out of clumsiness, too.

Name: lucario
Flavor_Text:
It has the ability to sense the
auras of all things.
It understands human speech.

Name: hippopotas
Flavor_Text:
It lives in arid places. Instead
of perspiration, it expels grainy
sand from its body.

Name: hippowdon
Flavor_Text:
It is surprisingly quick to anger.
It holds its mouth agape as a
display of its strength.

Name: drapion
Flavor_Text:
Possessing a sturdy build, it takes
pride in its strength, taking down
foes without using toxins.

Name: mantyke
Flavor_Text:
People organize tours to see this
Pokémon frolic and skim the tops
of waves with Remoraid.

Name: abomasnow
Flavor_Text:
They appear when the snow flowers
bloom. When the petals fall, they
retreat to places unknown again.

Name: weavile
Flavor_Text:
Evolution made it even more
devious. It communicates by clawing
signs in boulders.

Name: magnezone
Flavor_Text:
A group tried to use scientific
means to make MAGNEZONE evolve,
but their efforts ended in failure.

Name: lickilicky
Flavor_Text:
Its saliva can decompose anything.
It wraps its long tongue around things
to coat them with its sticky saliva.

Name: electivire
Flavor_Text:
The instant it presses the tips of its
tails onto an opponent, it sends over
20,000 volts of electricity into the foe.

Name: magmortar
Flavor_Text:
It blasts fireballs of over
3,600 degrees Fahrenheit out of its
arms. Its breath also sears and sizzles.

Name: leafeon
Flavor_Text:
Although it doesn’t like disputes, it will sharpen
the leaf on its tail into a blade and fight if it has
to protect its friends.

Name: dusknoir
Flavor_Text:
It is said to take lost spirits
into its pliant body and guide
them home.

Name: rotom
Flavor_Text:
Research continues on this Pokémon,
which could be the power source of a
unique motor.

Name: uxie
Flavor_Text:
It is said that its emergence
gave humans the intelligence to
improve their quality of life.

Name: mesprit
Flavor_Text:
When Mesprit flew, people learned
the joy and sadness of living.
It was the birth of emotions.

Name: giratina
Flavor_Text:
This Pokémon is said to live in a world on the
reverse side of ours, where common knowledge is
distorted and strange.

Name: cresselia
Flavor_Text:
Shiny particles are released from
its wings like a veil. It is said
to represent the crescent moon.

Name: phione
Flavor_Text:
When the water warms, they inflate the flotation sac
on their heads and drift languidly on the sea
in packs.

Name: manaphy
Flavor_Text:
It starts its life with a wondrous power that permits
it to bond with any kind of Pokémon.

Name: tepig
Flavor_Text:
It can deftly dodge its foe’s attacks while shooting
fireballs from its nose. It roasts berries before it
eats them.

Name: emboar
Flavor_Text:
It has mastered fast and powerful fighting moves.
It grows a beard of fire.

Name: oshawott
Flavor_Text:
The scalchop on its stomach is made from
the same elements as claws. It detaches
the scalchop for use as a blade.

Name: dewott
Flavor_Text:
Scalchop techniques differ from one
Dewott to another. It never
neglects maintaining its scalchops.

Name: samurott
Flavor_Text:
One swing of the sword incorporated in its armor
can fell an opponent. A simple glare from one of
them quiets everybody.

Name: patrat
Flavor_Text:
Using food stored in cheek pouches, they can keep
watch for days. They use their tails to communicate
with others.

Name: watchog
Flavor_Text:
They make the patterns on their bodies
shine in order to threaten predators.
Keen eyesight lets them see in the dark.

Name: lillipup
Flavor_Text:
The long hair around its face provides
an amazing radar that lets it sense
subtle changes in its surroundings.

Name: herdier
Flavor_Text:
It has black, cape-like fur that is
very hard and decreases the amount
of damage it receives.

Name: stoutland
Flavor_Text:
This extremely wise Pokémon excels
at rescuing people stranded at sea or
in the mountains.

Name: simisage
Flavor_Text:
It attacks enemies with strikes of its thorn-covered
tail. This Pokémon is wild tempered.

Name: pansear
Flavor_Text:
When it is angered, the temperature
of its head tuft reaches 600° F.
It uses its tuft to roast berries.

Name: panpour
Flavor_Text:
The water stored inside the tuft on
its head is full of nutrients. Plants
that receive its water grow large.

Name: simipour
Flavor_Text:
It prefers places with clean water.
When its tuft runs low, it replenishes
it by siphoning up water with its tail.

Name: munna
Flavor_Text:
This Pokémon appears before people and Pokémon
who are having nightmares and eats those dreams.

Name: musharna
Flavor_Text:
The dream mist coming from its forehead changes
into many different colors depending on the dream
that was eaten.

Name: pidove
Flavor_Text:
These Pokémon live in cities. They are accustomed
to people. Flocks often gather in parks and plazas.

Name: tranquill
Flavor_Text:
No matter where in the world it goes, it knows
where its nest is, so it never gets separated from
its Trainer.

Name: unfezant
Flavor_Text:
Unfezant are exceptional fliers. The females
are known for their stamina, while the males
outclass them in terms of speed.

Name: blitzle
Flavor_Text:
Its mane shines when it discharges
electricity. They use the frequency and
rhythm of these flashes to communicate.

Name: swoobat
Flavor_Text:
Emitting powerful sound waves tires it out.
Afterward, it won’t be able to fly for a
little while.

Name: excadrill
Flavor_Text:
It can help in tunnel construction. Its drill has
evolved into steel strong enough to bore through
iron plates.

Name: timburr
Flavor_Text:
Always carrying squared logs, they help out with
construction. As they grow, they carry bigger logs.

Name: conkeldurr
Flavor_Text:
It is thought that Conkeldurr taught humans how to
make concrete more than 2,000 years ago.

Name: seismitoad
Flavor_Text:
The vibrating of the bumps all over its body
causes earthquake-like tremors. Seismitoad and
Croagunk are similar species.

Name: throh
Flavor_Text:
When it encounters a foe bigger than itself, it wants
to throw it. It changes belts as it gets stronger.

Name: sewaddle
Flavor_Text:
Since this Pokémon makes its own clothes out of
leaves, it is a popular mascot for fashion designers.

Name: leavanny
Flavor_Text:
It keeps its eggs warm with heat from
fermenting leaves. It also uses leaves
to make warm wrappings for Sewaddle.

Name: venipede
Flavor_Text:
Using the feelers on its head and tail,
it picks up vibrations in the air to
determine its prey’s location and state.

Name: whirlipede
Flavor_Text:
This Pokémon spins itself rapidly and charges into
its opponents. Its top speed is just over 60 mph.

Name: whimsicott
Flavor_Text:
As long as this Pokémon bathes in sunlight, its
cotton keeps growing. If too much cotton fluff
builds up, Whimsicott tears it off and scatters it.

Name: lilligant
Flavor_Text:
As soon as it finds a male to be its partner,
the beautiful flower on its head darkens,
droops, and withers away.

Name: basculin
Flavor_Text:
Red- and blue-striped Basculin are
very violent and always fighting.
They are also remarkably tasty.

Name: sandile
Flavor_Text:
They live buried in the sands of the desert.
The sun-warmed sands prevent their body
temperature from dropping.

Name: darumaka
Flavor_Text:
When it sleeps, it pulls its limbs
into its body and its internal fire
goes down to 1,100° F.

Name: yamask
Flavor_Text:
These Pokémon arose from the spirits of
people interred in graves in past ages.
Each retains memories of its former life.

Name: cofagrigus
Flavor_Text:
It has been said that they swallow those
who get too close and turn them into
mummies. They like to eat gold nuggets.

Name: tirtouga
Flavor_Text:
Tirtouga is considered to be the ancestor of
many turtle Pokémon. It was restored to life
from a fossil.

Name: carracosta
Flavor_Text:
They can live both in the ocean and on
land. A slap from one of them is enough
to open a hole in the bottom of a tanker.

Name: archen
Flavor_Text:
It was revived from an ancient fossil.
Not able to fly, it lived in treetops and
hopped from one branch to another.

Name: archeops
Flavor_Text:
They are intelligent and will cooperate
to catch prey. From the ground, they
use a running start to take flight.

Name: garbodor
Flavor_Text:
For a time, their numbers increased explosively
in Alola. Since the arrival of Grimer, their
population has decreased dramatically.

Name: cinccino
Flavor_Text:
A special oil that seeps through their fur helps
them avoid attacks. The oil fetches a high price
at market.

Name: gothorita
Flavor_Text:
They use hypnosis to control people and
Pokémon. Tales of Gothorita leading
people astray are told in every corner.

Name: solosis
Flavor_Text:
Because their bodies are enveloped
in a special liquid, they can survive
in any environment.

Name: duosion
Flavor_Text:
When their two divided brains
think the same thoughts,
their psychic power is maximized.

Name: swanna
Flavor_Text:
It administers sharp, powerful pecks
with its bill. It whips its long neck to
deliver forceful repeated strikes.

Name: sawsbuck
Flavor_Text:
The plants growing on its horns change
according to the season. The leaders of
the herd possess magnificent horns.

Name: karrablast
Flavor_Text:
When they feel threatened, they spit
an acidic liquid to drive attackers away.
This Pokémon targets Shelmet.

Name: escavalier
Flavor_Text:
These Pokémon evolve by wearing the shell
covering of a Shelmet. The steel armor protects
their whole body.

Name: amoonguss
Flavor_Text:
It lures prey close by dancing and waving its
arm caps, which resemble Poké Balls, in a
swaying motion.

Name: jellicent
Flavor_Text:
The fate of the ships and crew that
wander into Jellicent’s habitat:
all sunken, all lost, all vanished.

Name: alomomola
Flavor_Text:
It uses its special mucus to close the wounds of
injured Pokémon. The reason for this behavior
remains unknown.

Name: galvantula
Flavor_Text:
They employ an electrically charged web
to trap their prey. While it is immobilized
by shock, they leisurely consume it.

Name: ferroseed
Flavor_Text:
It absorbs the iron it finds in the
rock while clinging to the ceiling.
It shoots spikes when in danger.

Name: klinklang
Flavor_Text:
The gear with the red core is rotated at high speed
for a rapid energy charge.

Name: eelektrik
Flavor_Text:
It wraps itself around its prey and
paralyzes it with electricity from the
round spots on its sides. Then it chomps.

Name: eelektross
Flavor_Text:
With their sucker mouths, they suck in prey.
Then they use their fangs to shock the prey
with electricity.

Name: beheeyem
Flavor_Text:
Sometimes found drifting above wheat fields,
this Pokémon can control the memories of
its opponents.

Name: litwick
Flavor_Text:
The younger the life this Pokémon absorbs,
the brighter and eerier the flame on its
head burns.

Name: lampent
Flavor_Text:
The spirits it absorbs fuel its baleful
fire. It hangs around hospitals waiting
for people to pass on.

Name: chandelure
Flavor_Text:
The spirits burned up in its ominous flame lose their
way and wander this world forever.

Name: cubchoo
Flavor_Text:
Their snot is a barometer of health.
When healthy, their snot is sticky and
the power of their ice moves increases.

Name: cryogonal
Flavor_Text:
They are composed of ice crystals. They capture
prey with chains of ice, freezing the prey at
-148 degrees Fahrenheit.

Name: shelmet
Flavor_Text:
When it and Karrablast are together, and both
receive electrical stimulation, they both evolve.

Name: druddigon
Flavor_Text:
It runs through the narrow tunnels
formed by Excadrill and Onix.
It uses its sharp claws to catch prey.

Name: golurk
Flavor_Text:
It is said that Golurk were ordered to protect
people and Pokémon by the ancient people who
made them.

Name: bisharp
Flavor_Text:
This pitiless Pokémon commands a group
of Pawniard to hound prey into immobility.
It then moves in to finish the prey off.

Name: rufflet
Flavor_Text:
They will challenge anything, even strong
opponents, without fear. Their frequent fights help
them become stronger.

Name: braviary
Flavor_Text:
The more scars they have, the more
respect these brave soldiers of the sky 
get from their peers.

Name: heatmor
Flavor_Text:
Using their very hot, flame-covered tongues,
they burn through Durant’s steel bodies and
consume their insides.

Name: zweilous
Flavor_Text:
Since their two heads do not get along
and compete with each other for food,
they always eat too much.

Name: tornadus
Flavor_Text:
In every direction it flies,
creating winds so powerful,
they blow everything away.

Name: thundurus
Flavor_Text:
The spikes on its tail discharge immense bolts of
lightning. It flies around the Unova region firing off
lightning bolts.

Name: reshiram
Flavor_Text:
When Reshiram’s tail flares, the
heat energy moves the atmosphere
and changes the world’s weather.

Name: meloetta
Flavor_Text:
The melodies sung by Meloetta have the power to
make Pokémon that hear them happy or sad.

Name: genesect
Flavor_Text:
This Pokémon existed 300 million years
ago. Team Plasma altered it and
attached a cannon to its back.

Name: quilladin
Flavor_Text:
It relies on its sturdy shell to deflect predators’
attacks. It counterattacks with its sharp quills.

Name: chesnaught
Flavor_Text:
When it takes a defensive posture with its fists
guarding its face, it could withstand a bomb blast.

Name: fennekin
Flavor_Text:
As it walks, it munches on a twig in place
of a snack. It intimidates opponents
by puffing hot air out of its ears.

Name: delphox
Flavor_Text:
Using psychic power, it generates a
fiery vortex of 5,400 degrees Fahrenheit,
incinerating foes swept into this whirl of flame.

Name: froakie
Flavor_Text:
It secretes flexible bubbles from its chest and back.
The bubbles reduce the damage it would otherwise
take when attacked.

Name: greninja
Flavor_Text:
It creates throwing stars out of compressed water.
When it spins them and throws them at high speed,
these stars can split metal in two.

Name: fletchling
Flavor_Text:
When it’s excited, its temperature can double,
spiking hormone production in its body.

Name: talonflame
Flavor_Text:
When attacking prey, it can reach speeds
of up to 310 mph. It finishes its prey off
with a colossal kick.

Name: vivillon
Flavor_Text:
Vivillon with many different patterns are
found all over the world. These patterns
are affected by the climate of their habitat.

Name: pyroar
Flavor_Text:
With fiery breath of more than 10,000 degrees
Fahrenheit, they viciously threaten any challenger.
The females protect the pride’s cubs.

Name: skiddo
Flavor_Text:
If it has sunshine and water, it doesn’t
need to eat, because it can generate
energy from the leaves on its back.

Name: gogoat
Flavor_Text:
It can tell how its Trainer is feeling by
subtle shifts in the grip on its horns.
This empathic sense lets them run as if one being.

Name: espurr
Flavor_Text:
It has enough psychic energy to blast
everything within 300 feet of itself,
but it has no control over its power.

Name: meowstic
Flavor_Text:
The defensive instinct of the males is strong.
It’s when they’re protecting themselves or their
partners that they unleash their full power.

Name: honedge
Flavor_Text:
Honedge’s soul once belonged to a person who
was killed a long time ago by the sword that
makes up Honedge’s body.

Name: aromatisse
Flavor_Text:
It devises various scents, pleasant and unpleasant,
and emits scents that its enemies dislike in order
to gain an edge in battle.

Name: slurpuff
Flavor_Text:
Its sense of smell is 100 million times better than
a human’s, so even the faintest scent tells it about
everything in the area. It’s like it can see with its nose!

Name: malamar
Flavor_Text:
It wields the most compelling hypnotic powers
of any Pokémon, and it forces others to do
whatever it wants.

Name: binacle
Flavor_Text:
If the two don’t work well together, both their
offense and defense fall apart. Without good
teamwork, they won’t survive.

Name: barbaracle
Flavor_Text:
When they evolve, two Binacle multiply into seven.
They fight with the power of seven Binacle.

Name: skrelp
Flavor_Text:
It’s not good at swimming, so it clings to the
seaweed. In the Alola region, it’s often found
near Dhelmise.

Name: dragalge
Flavor_Text:
It blends in with seaweed to ambush its prey
and then takes them down with a poisonous
liquid strong enough to melt metal.

Name: clawitzer
Flavor_Text:
By expelling water from the nozzle in the back
of its claw, it can move at a speed of 60 knots.

Name: helioptile
Flavor_Text:
They make their home in deserts. They can
generate their energy from basking in the sun,
so eating food is not a requirement.

Name: tyrunt
Flavor_Text:
Its immense jaws have enough destructive
force that it can chew up an automobile.
It lived 100 million years ago.

Name: amaura
Flavor_Text:
This calm Pokémon lived in a cold land where
there were no violent predators like Tyrantrum.

Name: dedenne
Flavor_Text:
Its whiskers serve as antennas. By sending and
receiving electrical waves, it can communicate
with others over vast distances.

Name: goomy
Flavor_Text:
It uses its horns to check out its surroundings.
They’re very sensitive, so if you grab them, it
will feel a strong shock and be unable to move.

Name: goodra
Flavor_Text:
This very friendly Dragon-type Pokémon
will hug its beloved Trainer, leaving
that Trainer covered in sticky slime.

Name: klefki
Flavor_Text:
These key collectors threaten any attackers
by fiercely jingling their keys at them.

Name: phantump
Flavor_Text:
These Pokémon are created when
spirits possess rotten tree stumps.
They prefer to live in abandoned forests.

Name: trevenant
Flavor_Text:
Small roots that extend from the tips of this
Pokémon’s feet can tie into the trees of the
forest and give Trevenant control over them.

Name: gourgeist
Flavor_Text:
A large-sized Pumpkaboo evolves into
a large-sized Gourgeist. Its bodily proportions
also get passed on to its descendants.

Name: yveltal
Flavor_Text:
When its life comes to an end, it absorbs
the life energy of every living thing
and turns into a cocoon once more.

Name: zygarde
Flavor_Text:
When the Kalos region’s ecosystem falls into
disarray, it appears and reveals its secret power.

Name: volcanion
Flavor_Text:
It lets out billows of steam and disappears into
the dense fog. It’s said to live in mountains
where humans do not tread.

Name: rowlet
Flavor_Text:
At a distance, it launches its sharp feathers while
flying about. If the enemy gets too close, Rowlet
switches tactics and delivers vicious kicks.

Name: decidueye
Flavor_Text:
In a tenth of a second, it can nock and fire an
arrow quill, piercing an opponent’s weak point
before they notice what’s happening.

Name: incineroar
Flavor_Text:
This Pokémon has a violent, selfish disposition.
If it’s not in the mood to listen, it will ignore its
Trainer’s orders with complete nonchalance.

Name: yungoos
Flavor_Text:
It wanders around in a never-ending search for
food. At dusk, it collapses from exhaustion and
falls asleep on the spot.

Name: vikavolt
Flavor_Text:
It produces electricity via an electrical organ in
its abdomen. It overwhelms bird Pokémon with
shocking beams of electrical energy.

Name: crabrawler
Flavor_Text:
It punches so much, its pincers often come off
from overuse, but they grow back quickly. What
little meat they contain is rich and delicious.

Name: crabominable
Flavor_Text:
It stores coldness in its pincers and pummels its
foes. It can even smash thick walls of ice
to bits!

Name: ribombee
Flavor_Text:
Ribombee absolutely hate getting wet or
rained on. In the cloudy Galar region,
they are very seldom seen.

Name: toxapex
Flavor_Text:
With its 12 legs, it creates a dome to shelter
within. The flow of the tides doesn’t affect
Toxapex in there, so it’s very comfortable.

Name: mudbray
Flavor_Text:
Loads weighing up to 50 times as much as its
own body weight pose no issue for this Pokémon.
It’s skilled at making use of mud.

Name: mudsdale
Flavor_Text:
It remains calm and unmoving no matter the
situation. It mixes dirt with the saliva in its
mouth to make a special kind of mud.

Name: fomantis
Flavor_Text:
During the day, Fomantis basks in sunlight and
sleeps peacefully. It wakes and moves around
at night.

Name: morelull
Flavor_Text:
It scatters its shining spores around itself.
Even though they’re dangerous, nighttime tours
of forests where Morelull live are popular.

Name: shiinotic
Flavor_Text:
Its flickering spores lure in prey and put them to
sleep. Once this Pokémon has its prey snoozing,
it drains their vitality with its fingertips.

Name: salazzle
Flavor_Text:
It punishes Salandit that couldn’t bring it food
with a fierce slap of its flame-spewing palm.

Name: stufful
Flavor_Text:
Stufful hates to be hugged or touched in any
way. It will squirm, thrash, and resist with
amazing power.

Name: bounsweet
Flavor_Text:
Although it’s too sugary for human consumption,
Bounsweet’s sweat can be watered down into a
juice with just the right amount of sweetness.

Name: oranguru
Flavor_Text:
Deep in the jungle, high in the lofty canopy, this
Pokémon abides. On rare occasions, it shows up
at the beach to match wits with Slowking.

Name: golisopod
Flavor_Text:
With a flashing slash of its giant sharp claws,
it cleaves seawater—or even air—right in two.

Name: sandygast
Flavor_Text:
If you build sand mounds when you’re playing,
destroy them before you go home, or they
may get possessed and become Sandygast.

Name: palossand
Flavor_Text:
This Pokémon lives on beaches, but it hates
water. Palossand can’t maintain its castle-like
shape if it gets drenched by a heavy rain.

Name: pyukumuku
Flavor_Text:
The tradition known as Pyukumuku chucking
started from the custom of throwing Pyukumuku
back into the sea after they wash onshore.

Name: type-null
Flavor_Text:
Due to the danger that this synthetic Pokémon
may go on a rampage, it wears a control mask
to restrain its power.

Name: silvally
Flavor_Text:
This is its form once it has awakened and
evolved. Freed from its heavy mask, its speed is
greatly increased.

Name: minior
Flavor_Text:
It lives in the ozone layer, where it becomes
food for stronger Pokémon. When it tries to run
away, it falls to the ground.

Name: komala
Flavor_Text:
It is born asleep, and it dies asleep. All its
movements are apparently no more than the
results of it tossing and turning in its dreams.

Name: togedemaru
Flavor_Text:
The spiny fur on its back is normally at rest.
When this Pokémon becomes agitated, its fur
stands on end and stabs into its attackers.

Name: dhelmise
Flavor_Text:
After lowering its anchor, it waits for its prey. It
catches large Wailord and drains their life-force.

Name: jangmo-o
Flavor_Text:
They live in mountains where no trace of
humans can be detected. Jangmo-o grow
little by little as they battle one another.

Name: hakamo-o
Flavor_Text:
It leaps at its prey with a courageous shout.
Its scaly punches tear its opponents to shreds.

Name: tapu-koko
Flavor_Text:
Although it’s called a guardian deity, if a person
or Pokémon puts it in a bad mood, it will become
a malevolent deity and attack.

Name: tapu-lele
Flavor_Text:
Although called a guardian deity, Tapu Lele is
devoid of guilt about its cruel disposition and
can be described as nature incarnate.

Name: tapu-bulu
Flavor_Text:
It pulls large trees up by the roots and swings
them around. It causes vegetation to grow,
and then it absorbs energy from the growth.

Name: tapu-fini
Flavor_Text:
This guardian deity of Poni Island manipulates
water. Because it lives deep within a thick fog,
it came to be both feared and revered.

Name: cosmoem
Flavor_Text:
It sucks in dust from the air at an astounding rate,
frantically building up energy within its core as
preparation for evolution.

Name: lunala
Flavor_Text:
Records of it exist in writings from long, long
ago, where it was known by the name
“the beast that calls the moon.”

Name: nihilego
Flavor_Text:
One of the Ultra Beasts. It’s unclear whether or
not this Pokémon is sentient, but sometimes it
can be observed behaving like a young girl.

Name: buzzwole
Flavor_Text:
A mysterious life-form called an Ultra Beast.
Witnesses saw it pulverize a dump truck with a
single punch.

Name: xurkitree
Flavor_Text:
Although it’s alien to this world and a danger
here, it’s apparently a common organism in the
world where it normally lives.

Name: celesteela
Flavor_Text:
Although it’s alien to this world and a danger
here, it’s apparently a common organism in the
world where it normally lives.

Name: magearna
Flavor_Text:
It synchronizes its consciousness with others
to understand their feelings. This faculty makes
it useful for taking care of people.

Name: marshadow
Flavor_Text:
It slips into the shadows of others and mimics
their powers and movements. As it improves, it
becomes stronger than those it’s imitating.

Name: poipole
Flavor_Text:
An Ultra Beast that lives in a different world, it
cackles wildly as it sprays its opponents with
poison from the needles on its head.

Name: naganadel
Flavor_Text:
It stores hundreds of liters of poisonous liquid
inside its body. It is one of the organisms known
as UBs.

Name: stakataka
Flavor_Text:
When stone walls started moving and attacking,
the brute’s true identity was this mysterious
life-form, which brings to mind an Ultra Beast.

Name: zeraora
Flavor_Text:
It electrifies its claws and tears its opponents
apart with them. Even if they dodge its attack,
they’ll be electrocuted by the flying sparks.

Name: melmetal
Flavor_Text:
Centrifugal force is behind the punches of
Melmetal’s heavy hex-nut arms. Melmetal is said
to deliver the strongest punches of all Pokémon.

Name: drizzile
Flavor_Text:
Highly intelligent but also very lazy,
it keeps enemies out of its territory
by laying traps everywhere.

Name: greedent
Flavor_Text:
It stashes berries in its tail—so many berries that
they fall out constantly. But this Pokémon is a bit
slow-witted, so it doesn’t notice the loss.

Name: rookidee
Flavor_Text:
It will bravely challenge any opponent, no matter
how powerful. This Pokémon benefits from every
battle—even a defeat increases its strength a bit.

Name: corvisquire
Flavor_Text:
Smart enough to use tools in battle, these
Pokémon have been seen picking up rocks and
flinging them or using ropes to wrap up enemies.

Name: corviknight
Flavor_Text:
This Pokémon reigns supreme in the skies of the
Galar region. The black luster of its steel body
could drive terror into the heart of any foe.

Name: dottler
Flavor_Text:
It barely moves, but it’s still alive. Hiding in its
shell without food or water seems to have
awakened its psychic powers.

Name: orbeetle
Flavor_Text:
It’s famous for its high level of intelligence, and
the large size of its brain is proof that it also
possesses immense psychic power.

Name: nickit
Flavor_Text:
Cunning and cautious, this Pokémon survives by
stealing food from others. It erases its tracks with
swipes of its tail as it makes off with its plunder.

Name: thievul
Flavor_Text:
With a lithe body and sharp claws, it goes
around stealing food and eggs. Boltund
is its natural enemy.

Name: gossifleur
Flavor_Text:
It whirls around in the wind while singing a joyous
song. This delightful display has charmed many
into raising this Pokémon.

Name: eldegoss
Flavor_Text:
The cotton on the head of this Pokémon can be
spun into a glossy, gorgeous yarn—a Galar
regional specialty.

Name: wooloo
Flavor_Text:
If its fleece grows too long, Wooloo won’t be
able to move. Cloth made with the wool of this
Pokémon is surprisingly strong.

Name: drednaw
Flavor_Text:
In the Galar region, there’s a tale about
this Pokémon chewing up a mountain and
using the rubble to stop a flood.

Name: rolycoly
Flavor_Text:
Most of its body has the same composition as
coal. Fittingly, this Pokémon was first discovered
in coal mines about 400 years ago.

Name: carkol
Flavor_Text:
It forms coal inside its body. Coal dropped by
this Pokémon once helped fuel the lives of
people in the Galar region.

Name: appletun
Flavor_Text:
Its body is covered in sweet nectar, and the
skin on its back is especially yummy. Children
used to have it as a snack.

Name: silicobra
Flavor_Text:
As it digs, it swallows sand and stores it in its
neck pouch. The pouch can hold more than
17 pounds of sand.

Name: sandaconda
Flavor_Text:
Its unique style of coiling allows it to blast sand
out of its sand sac more efficiently.

Name: toxel
Flavor_Text:
It manipulates the chemical makeup of its poison
to produce electricity. The voltage is weak, but it
can cause a tingling paralysis.

Name: clobbopus
Flavor_Text:
Its tentacles tear off easily, but it isn’t alarmed
when that happens—it knows they’ll grow back.
It’s about as smart as a three-year-old.

Name: hattrem
Flavor_Text:
Using the braids on its head, it pummels foes to
get them to quiet down. One blow from those
braids would knock out a professional boxer.

Name: morgrem
Flavor_Text:
With sly cunning, it tries to lure people into the
woods. Some believe it to have the power to
make crops grow.

Name: grimmsnarl
Flavor_Text:
Gigantamax energy has caused more hair to
sprout all over its body. With the added strength,
it can jump over the world’s tallest building.

Name: obstagoon
Flavor_Text:
Its voice is staggering in volume. Obstagoon
has a tendency to take on a threatening posture
and shout—this move is known as Obstruct.

Name: mr-rime
Flavor_Text:
It’s highly skilled at tap-dancing. It waves its cane
of ice in time with its graceful movements.

Name: runerigus
Flavor_Text:
Never touch its shadowlike body, or you’ll be
shown the horrific memories behind the picture
carved into it.

Name: alcremie
Flavor_Text:
It launches swarms of missiles, each made of
cream and loaded with 100,000 kilocalories.
Get hit by one of these, and your head will swim.

Name: snom
Flavor_Text:
It eats snow that piles up on the ground.
The more snow it eats, the bigger and more
impressive the spikes on its back grow.

Name: frosmoth
Flavor_Text:
It shows no mercy to any who desecrate fields
and mountains. It will fly around on its icy wings,
causing a blizzard to chase offenders away.

Name: eiscue
Flavor_Text:
The hair on its head connects to the surface of its
brain. When this Pokémon has something on its
mind, its hair chills the air around it.

Name: morpeko
Flavor_Text:
It carries electrically roasted seeds with it as if
they’re precious treasures. No matter how much
it eats, it always gets hungry again in short order.

Name: cufant
Flavor_Text:
If a job requires serious strength, this Pokémon
will excel at it. Its copper body tarnishes in the
rain, turning a vibrant green color.

Name: copperajah
Flavor_Text:
They came over from another region long
ago and worked together with humans.
Their green skin is resistant to water.

Name: arctozolt
Flavor_Text:
The shaking of its freezing upper half is what
generates its electricity. It has a hard time
walking around.

Name: dragapult
Flavor_Text:
When it isn’t battling, it keeps Dreepy in the
holes on its horns. Once a fight starts, it launches
the Dreepy like supersonic missiles.

Name: zacian
Flavor_Text:
Able to cut down anything with a single strike,
it became known as the Fairy King’s Sword,
and it inspired awe in friend and foe alike.

Name: zarude
Flavor_Text:
This Zarude left its pack to raise a human child.
The cloth Zarude would wrap the child with has a
comforting scent that calmed the child’s crying.

Name: regieleki
Flavor_Text: This Pokémon is a cluster of electrical energy. It's said that removing the rings on Regieleki's body will unleash the Pokémon's latent power.

Name: regidrago
Flavor_Text: Its body is composed of crystallized dragon energy. Regidrago is said to have the powers of every dragon Pokémon.

Name: calyrex
Flavor_Text:
Calyrex is a merciful Pokémon, capable of
providing healing and blessings. It reigned over
the Galar region in times of yore.
